Text:
OMG, yet another MKV. What's wrong with you fucktards?

Please use .MP4 instead, or any other container for that matter (excepting WMV of course). Thanks.
Bro in MKV our encode is protected and rip quality is also good :)

I much prefer MKV, in fact i do my own re-codes in MKV because of the quality. So forget what that idiot said & be assured that those of us that actually know what we're talking about are grateful & appreciate the effort of what you do;-))
